title.rendered: Aqualis ASA: Invitation to presentation of third quarter results 2015

content.rendered:
16 October 2015 – Aqualis ASA will publish its third quarter results for 2015 on Tuesday 27 October at 07:00 CET. A presentation of the results will be held at 09:00 CET the same morning.

Aqualis would also like to invite investors, analysts and media to a presentation of the third quarter results at Hotel Continental in Oslo. The presentation will be held in English. 

Date: 27 October 2015

Time: 09:00 CET

Venue: Hotel Continental, Stortingsgaten 24/26, 0117 Oslo, Norway

 

The presentation will be broadcast live on http://webtv.hegnar.no/presentation.php?webcastId=25481094

 

The Q3 2015 report and presentation will be published on www.aqualisbraemar.com and www.newsweb.no.
